name: masonite
description: A simple static website generator using HTML with light templating and Stylus for CSS preprocessing.
author: Costa Michailidis <costa@innovationbound.com> (http://www.github.com/wamoyo)

scripts.test: npm run wreck && npm run start
scripts.watch: npm run watch-public && npm run watch-pages && npm watch-styles
scripts.build: npm run build-public && npm run build-pages && npm run build-styles
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
